RelatedSentence: MELBOURNE , May 20 ( Bernama ) -- Cambodia hopes to sign a controversial refugee resettlement deal with Australia within weeks .
MELBOURNE , May 20 ( Bernama ) -- Cambodia hopes to sign a controversial refugee resettlement deal with Australia within weeks .
The Cambodian Government says a working group has completed a study on Australia 's proposal and will reply in the coming days .
